sekcija_7.paragraf_8: Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) and Least Common Multiple (LCG): These concepts are crucial in number theory. NZD is the largest number by which 2 numbers can be divided, while NZV is the smallest number that is a multiple of both numbers.
